title: FIORA BUG (Kog-Maw Passive)
body:
Was playing a custom game with bots to try out my new fiora skin see what it looks like and i came across a bug on fiora.
When fiora ultimates kogmaw just as he dies he can run around with fiora ultimate on say like he can run around with black shield and stuff like that, But with this when he respawn each time he respawns with fiora's ultimate on and the passive part of the ultimate can go off but the healing part cannot I've tested it out and 3/5 times its worked and i think it needs to be removed :)
Sorry there is no oce post about bugs and stuff so i thought i might put it here
Fiora: Nightraven
Macbook Air 
Bug
